Package rl.util.security

Contains useful classes for implementing security functionality.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DesEncrypter
    Implementation of an Encrypter, which uses the DES algorithm.
    Encrypter
    Singleton class, providing a unique access point for encryption and decryption of strings.
    SecureHashService
    Singleton class, which supports hash value generation for given strings.

Package rl.util.security Description

Contains useful classes for implementing security functionality.
